generated_text:
- road: The paved surface extending into the distance, marked by lane lines and bordered by sidewalks and curbs, is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: The paved areas adjacent to the road, separated by curbs and lined with trash bins and poles, are sidewalks.
- building: Multiple residential houses with roofs, windows, and doors are visible along the street, qualifying as buildings.
- vegetation: Several leafless trees and trimmed hedges are visible along the sidewalks and in front of the houses.
- terrain: Areas of grass and bare earth are visible alongside the sidewalks and between the houses.
- sky: The overcast, gray sky is visible above the trees and buildings, with some electrical wires in front of it.
- car: Multiple cars, including sedans and SUVs, are parked along the street and visible in the distance.
- pole: Several utility poles with wires are visible along the street, including one prominent pole in the center of the image.
- traffic sign: A green traffic sign with white text is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
